plum
surname Li
sound of drums
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur
grand/intense/prosperous/to swell/to bulge

sentences.english: Let me take you to see Li Longjia's personal bath.
sentences.chinese: 我再带你去看看李隆基自己沐浴的场所。

sentences.english: Indeed, Emperor Li Longji's pool is much bigger.
sentences.chinese: 果然是皇帝李隆基自己用的浴池，就是大。

sentences.english: This is the hot spring bathing pool Li Longji gave his concubine Yang Yuhuan.
sentences.chinese: 这就是李隆基送给妃子杨玉环的温泉浴池。
